## isNavigationFailure() function

Check if an object is a [NavigationFailure](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNavigationFailure(error: any, type?: ErrorTypes.NAVIGATION_GUARD_REDIRECT): error is NavigationRedirectError;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | any | possible [NavigationFailure](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.md) |
|  type | ErrorTypes.NAVIGATION\_GUARD\_REDIRECT | optional types to check for |

<b>Returns:</b>

error is NavigationRedirectError

## Example


```js
import { isNavigationFailure, NavigationFailureType } from 'vue-router'

router.afterEach((to, from, failure) => {
  // Any kind of navigation failure
  if (isNavigationFailure(failure)) {
    // ...
  }
  // Only duplicated navigations
  if (isNavigationFailure(failure, NavigationFailureType.duplicated)) {
    // ...
  }
  // Aborted or canceled navigations
  if (isNavigationFailure(failure, NavigationFailureType.aborted | NavigationFailureType.canceled)) {
    // ...
  }
})

```
